resources.string: Change your mobile data icons! For example you can change the 3G/4G icons into 5G!
XPosed is not available.\nPlease ensure it\'s working and is activated for this module.\nIf you think this is wrong, click refresh or restart your device.
SystemUI is not hooked properly.\nCheck if the activation scope is correctly set and restart SystemUI or reboot your device.
SystemUI Resources are not hooked properly.\nDid you enable the resource hooks?\nRestart SystemUI or reboot your device.
Restart the app to check again.
The icon %1$s will be replaced by the %2$s icon %3$s.
Choose what icon to replace the icon %1$s with.
Here you can select each icon and what to replace it with.
Apply changes by restarting SystemUI.\n(root access needed)
Replace this icon with an empty version.
This usually will fix itself upon reboot.\nJust reboot now. You got the time. C\'mon do it. Just do it.
Enable this to overwrite the color of the icon.\nThe icon will not automatically adjust to dark mode anymore.
The color will only be applied for icons set for replacement.\nYou can replace an icon with itself to only apply the color.
